attributes.action: Sir Patrick Moore should be buried in Westminster Abbey for his contribution to Astronomy and Science in General - when the time comes of course.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who in this country has done more to popularise science and present often difficult subjects in a clear and concise manner for as long as has Sir Patrick Moore. He should be honoured - when the time comes - with a spot in Westminster Abbey as is reserved for all the countries greatest citizens.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
